title: Himi 349
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e kakai na’e nofo
‘I he fu’u po’uli,
Kuo nau mamata tonu,
Ki he maama lahi.
2.
Mo e kakai na’e nofo,
‘I he potu malu,
Ko e malu ‘o e mate,
Fakalaumālie.
3.
Pea kuo tupu hake,
Kia kinautolu,
‘A e maama, ke nau ‘ilo,
‘A e hala lelei.
4.
He ko e maama ‘a Sīsū,
‘Oku ulo ma’u pē,
Pea ko e maama’anga,
Ki he laumālie.
5.
Ke tau tali ‘ene ngāue,
Pea ‘amanaki,
Ke ne tutu ‘etau maama.
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
6.
Ke tau ‘alu ‘i he maama,
‘I he’ene ofi
‘I he loto fiefia,
Pea fakafeta’i. *
